sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RecurringCostRollupProcessor</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Creates, updates and deletes Recurring Price entries for a Request</description>
        <name>RecurringCostRollupProcessor</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RecurringCostRollupProcessor = Class.create();
RecurringCostRollupProcessor.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	_fieldToPrice : function(element) {
		var price = parseFloat(element);
		if (isNaN(price))
			price = 0;
		return price;
	},
	
	processChangeToItem: function(item) {
		if (JSUtil.nil(item) || JSUtil.nil(item.request))
			return;
		var requestId = item.request.sys_id+"";
		this.processChangeToRequest(requestId);
	},
		
	processChangeToRequest: function(request) {
		if (JSUtil.nil(request))
			return;
		new SNC.Request(request).recalculateRecurringCost();
	},
	
	type: 'RecurringCostRollupProcessor'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2012-11-13 16:04:01</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>23b863a337a1300054b6a3549dbe5d44</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RecurringCostRollupProcessor</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_23b863a337a1300054b6a3549dbe5d44</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2015-04-15 10:54:46</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>631</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
